front.title: IEEE/ISO/IEC International Standard-Telecommunications and information exchange between information technology systems--Requirements for local and metropolitan area networks--Part 1CM:Time-sensitive networking for fronthaul - AMENDMENT 1: Enhancements to fronthaul profiles to support new fronthaul interface, synchronization, and syntonization standards

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Enhancements to fronthaul profiles are defined in this amendment to IEEE Std 802.1CM(TM)-2018 in order to address new developments in fronthaul interface standards and in related synchronization and syntonization standards.
